item.title: Blog The Second: Moving to Cryogen on Github Pages
item.description: ReignitionI hadn't touched this blog in a long time, but needing some projects to keep my skills up, I've decided to resurrect it. However, I didn't want to go back to the standard GitHub Pages Jekyll workflow. I found my relative inability to tinker constraining, as I didn't know the underlying language, namely Ruby. Jekyll is a fine project, but I'm principally a Clojure dev, and I want to feel like I own my blog, and that means the code that powers it.
